_header: Our nature decay as reason maketh relation
_description: Prayer to God to defend us from the sweating sickness and ‘frens pox’ — two stanzas of eight lines

CamTCC1117.First Lines:
The chlernes of þe faddar synnifyes in thys nameWith þe
                    wirgenall bowte of þe modar dedyis…
CamTCC1117.Last Lines:
…Stowp gallant & þe femy all pestylens doth growThe
                    name of Ihesu from soden deth defend ows
